body:
@chuckatkins @danlipsa 

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install paraview@5.5.2%intel@18.0.2 build_type=Release +mpi~opengl2+osmesa +plugins+python
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux sn364.localdomain 3.10.0-1062.1.1.1chaos.ch6.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Sep 4 16:09:20 PDT 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.7 (Maipo)
``` 

### Commit I'm on:
```console
[stam@sn364 spack]$ git branch -vv
* develop 9c10b8059 [origin/develop] add package cuda@10.2.89 (#13819)
```

### Configs

- [packages.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/3923385/packages.yaml.txt)
- [compilers.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/3923387/compilers.yaml.txt)

### Additional information

```console
$ spack spec --install-status  --install-status paraview@5.5.2%intel@18.0.2 build_type=Release +mpi~opengl2+osmesa +plugins+python
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "paraview@5.5.2%intel@18.0.2 build_type=Release ~cuda cuda_arch=none ~examples~hdf5+mpi~opengl2+osmesa patches=281c98670a9169baeca2a91e1f74ba2229e827c82ac3be59cc62d46669a9928c +plugins+python~python3~qt arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell/fnhqkpv"

List of matching conflicts for spec:

    freetype@2.10.1%intel@18.0.2 cflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" cxxflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" fflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin"  arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^bzip2@1.0.8%intel@18.0.2 cflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" cxxflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" fflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" +shared arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@7.4.0 cflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64" cxxflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64" fflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64"  arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@7.4.0 cflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64" cxxflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64" fflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64"  arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^libpng@1.6.37%intel@18.0.2 cflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" cxxflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" fflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin"  arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
            ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@7.4.0 cflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64" cxxflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64" fflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/x86_64/gcc/7.4.0/lib64" +optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^pkgconf@1.6.3%intel@18.0.2 cflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" cxxflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin" fflags="-Wl,-rpath,/usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2018.2.046/compilers_and_libraries_2018/linux/lib/intel64_lin"  arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell

1. "%intel" conflicts with "freetype@2.8:" [freetype-2.8 and above cannot be built with icc (does not support __builtin_shuffle)]

```
title: ParaView Intel/18.0.2 and freetype incompatible
